title.narrative: IOM Migration och utveckling i Latinamerika
IOM Regional Migration and Development Latinamerica

description.narrative: Stöd till IOM för ett projekt som, under 2022 och 2023 och på regional nivå, bidrar till att venezuelanska migranter blir bättre integrerade socialt och ekonomiskt i sina värdsamhällen. Projektet inkluderar stöd till reglerad migration som ger uppehålls-och arbetstillstånd, utveckling av de offentliga arbetsförmedlingarna, insatser för att underlätta migranters egenföretagande, stöd till lokala myndigheters arbete med lokal integrering och till civilsamhället för att främja migranters deltagande i beslut som rör integration.

Support to IOM for a project that will, during 2022 and 2023 and at regional level, contribute to Venezuelan migrants being better integrated socially and economically in their host communities. The project include support to the regularization process, support to the public employment agencies to extend their services to migrants, strengthen the entrepreneurial skills of migrants, support to local authorise to design and carry out integration activities in a participatory manner and strengthen the capacity of civil society to enable broader participation of migrants in decision making.

The overall objective of the project is to contribute, at a regional level, to Venezuelan migrants being better integrated socially and economically in their host communities.
This objective should be achieved through two main outcomes:
1. Migrants are able to generate income as a result of integrated and harmonized regularization processes; improved access to employment opportunities; and capacities to start their own businesses.
2. Migrant integration needs, challenges and priorities are reflected in local, national and regional policies and decision-making bodies/forums and efficiently and appropriately addressed by local actors.

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

tag.narrative: 10.7 - Facilitate orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility of people, including through the implementation of planned and well-managed migration policies.
10.7 - Underlätta en ordnad, säker, reglerad och ansvarsfull migration och rörlighet av personer, inklusive genom planerad och väl fungerande migrationspolitik.

8.3 - Främja utvecklingsinriktad politik som stöder produktiv verksamhet, skapande av anständiga arbetstillfällen, företagande, kreativitet och innovation samt uppmuntra att mikroföretag liksom små och medelstora företag växer och blir en del av den formella ekonomin, bland annat genom tillgång till finansiella tjänster.

8.3 - Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services.
